text: Alectrosaurus is a theropod dinosaur related to Tyrannosaurus, Alioramus and Tarbosaurus. It lived in Mongolia and China in the Late Cretaceous period, about 90-70 million years ago. Alectrosaurus as a genus existed for about 9 million years. == References == Category:Cretaceous dinosaurs Category:Theropods
title: Alectrosaurus
